name: Judith Butler
school_tradition: Continental philosophy, Third-wave feminism, Critical theory, Queer theory, Postmodernism, Post-structuralism
main_interests: Feminist theory, Political philosophy, Ethics, Psychoanalysis, Discourse, Embodied cognition
influences: Karl Marx, Michel Foucault, Theodor Adorno, J.L. Austin, Luce Irigaray, Gayle Rubin, Monique Wittig, Emmanuel Lévinas, Jacques Derrida, Louis Althusser, Jacques Lacan, Sigmund Freud, Søren Kierkegaard, Friedrich Nietzsche, Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel, Simone de Beauvoir, Claude Lévi-Strauss
influenced: Eve Sedgwick, Michael Warner, Judith Halberstam, José Muñoz, Lauren Berlant, Kate Bornstein, Grace Ji-Sun Kim, Pussy Riot |
